description:
From a clean install of Fedora 16 (updated) in a VMware VM, I attempt to install openstack using the DevStack quick installation. After running ./stack.sh

I receive the error message: Service n-novnc is not running.

Neither URL(S) for Horizon or Keystone work. :(
title: Error: Service n-novnc is not running

comments.content:
From a clean install of Fedora 16 (updated) in a VMware VM, I attempt to install openstack using the DevStack quick installation. After running ./stack.sh

I receive the error message: Service n-novnc is not running.

Neither URL(S) for Horizon or Keystone work. :(
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~rfrecker

comments.content: Fedora 16 is EOL, can you try something newer?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~russellb
